name: TextPathEffects

properties.description: The center of each character's baseline is parallel to the path's tangent. This is the default effect.
properties.name: RAINBOW_PATH_EFFECT

properties.description: The text characters' vertical edges are perfectly vertical regardless of the path shape.
properties.name: SKEW_PATH_EFFECT

properties.description: The text characters' horizontal edges are perfectly horizontal regardless of the path shape.
properties.name: RIBBON_PATH_EFFECT

properties.description: The left edge of each character's baseline is on the path and no characters are rotated.
properties.name: STAIR_STEP_PATH_EFFECT

properties.description: The center of each character's baseline is on the path while each vertical edge is in line with the path's center point.
properties.name: GRAVITY_PATH_EFFECT

description: Options for the alignment and appearance of type on a path.
